definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: Belling out the end of the tube will permit a freer passage of air.
sentences.chinese: 把管端做成鐘口狀可使氣流更暢通。

sentences.english: Broad boulevards are unimpeded by traffic in the new district, called Kangbashi New Area.
sentences.chinese: 寬闊的馬路暢通無阻的縱橫在名叫康巴什的新城。

sentences.english: The channel of communication is smooth.
sentences.chinese: 溝通的渠道也是暢通的。

sentences.english: The path to knowledge is now unbarred.
sentences.chinese: 如今求知之路暢通無阻。

sentences.english: Secondly, to strengthen inter-organizational consultations, keep the information channels.
sentences.chinese: 其次，加強組織間的協商，保持信息渠道暢通。

sentences.english: Recommit yourself to doing all of the positive things you did to keep the lines of communication open and the relationships going.
sentences.chinese: 把所有保持交流暢通，讓感情繼續的事情重新做一遍。

sentences.english: The ghostly particles pass through our planet totally unimpeded.
sentences.chinese: 這如同幽靈的粒子在地球上暢通無阻。

sentences.english: Keep streets clear for the passage of  emergency vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 爲使救援車輛通行無阻，要保持街道暢通。

sentences.english: Verify tube patency before and after medication administration.
sentences.chinese: 給藥前後應確認飼管暢通。

sentences.english: International long distance, business fax, wireless networks unimpeded.
sentences.chinese: 國際長途，商務傳真，無線網絡暢通無阻。

sentences.english: Our digital communication network has been engineered so that copies flow with as little friction as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我們的數字通信網絡被打造成讓拷貝流盡量暢通無阻。

sentences.english: Nose drops or inhalations containing drugs that contract Blood vessels help drain the sinuses.
sentences.chinese: 含有可收縮血管幫助鼻竇暢通的藥物成分。

sentences.english: Launching tracks of No. 1 lifeboat clear in 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 一號艇放艇滑軌在10分鐘內暢通。

sentences.english: They tell the few drivers winding their way through shut-down streets which roads are open.
sentences.chinese: 他們會告知司機如何繞過關閉的街道找到暢通的道路。

sentences.english: Set up the "sun mountain" network, open people's appeal channels.
sentences.chinese: 搭建了《陽光秀山》網絡，暢通人民羣衆的訴求渠道。

sentences.english: Their luck held and they were able to walk freely out of the main camp and towards the store block.
sentences.chinese: 他們很幸運，暢通無阻地出了主營區，向倉庫區走去。

definition: to dredge/to open up a path for/to remove obstructions/to clear the way/to enlighten/persuasion
to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
qi and blood (two basic bodily fluids of Chinese medicine)
